review.reviewBody:
46. Seafood Pancake 海鲜葱饼 is excellent
19. Potato & Pork Rib Soup 猪骨土豆汤 is not very good at all - meat was tough, soup base is just not very inspired. I've had way better
Excellent quality food. Very consistent and reliable.
I love the Noodle With Pork Vegetable And Black Bean Sauce 炸酱面 it's so good and I always order it.
first time ordering from here and it was all superb! Definitely going to order here again.
Food here always good best korean business in town
